House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07948
FULL TITLE : AN ACT TO ESTABLISH A NATIONAL CENTER FOR INFORMATION AND TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE RELATING TO ALL TYPES OF FAMILY RESOURCE AND SUPPORT PROGRAMS
ABSTRACT : Promotes parental competencies to build a healthy development of both parents and children by stimulating the development and expansion of family resource and support program; encourage early intervention of such programs with families to improve problem situations before such situations become crises; and assist parents in enhancing their children’s development.
ALIAS NAME : "Lingkod Pamilya Act of 2018.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SY-ALVARADO, JOSE ANTONIO "KUYA JONATHAN" R.
DATE FILED : 2018-07-24
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON POPULATION AND FAMILY RELATIONS ON 2018-08-01
